meanings.definition: A public sale in which goods or property are sold to the highest bidder.
meanings.sent1: The auction was filled with people bidding on old furniture.
meanings.sent2: The auctioneer started the auction with a painting for sale.
meanings.sent3: At the auction, the cat bid for a can of tuna, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was put up for auction, with happiness as the highest bidder.
meanings.sent5: The auction echoed with the sound of enthusiastic bidders.

meanings.sent1: They decided to auction off their antique collection.
meanings.sent2: The family had to auction their farm to pay off debts.
meanings.sent3: He tried to auction his old socks, but no one was interested.
meanings.sent4: She auctioned her time to the highest bidder, offering help to the needy.
meanings.sent5: The charity decided to auction a celebrity lunch for a good cause.
